desc: Finds the user's avatar image

Show which buffs are of a certain type
Buffs of the same type do not stack

Displays the recommended build for a given class.

usage:
-changelog [version number and letter] or by itself will give you the latest version
-changelog [version number] will give you ALL changes within that version number (e.g. -changelog 24 will give you 24a through 24s)
desc: Displays the changelog in a direct message (since message can be very long)
Displays the changelog in a direct message (since message can be very long)
If you can't make a choice, ask the bot!

Show which debuffs are of a certain type
Debuffs of the same type do not stack
to start, type -debuff to get a list of debuffs to choose
Gives a link to donate to the map developer!
Lists all commands or info about a specific command.

Gives you the invite link to TWRPG-BOT

usage: -list [category] to search by name and type simultaneously OR can search it individually by adding the category to the end of the command: -listtype, -listname
desc: PMs the user with a list of items nearest to the word typed in. It can search by categories: name and type

usage: -lobby [lobby arguments]. Type -lobby to show its usage
desc: for game lobby hosting template

usage: -roll [from] [to] or nothing to roll the default 1-200
desc: Random number generator!

usage: -skill [skill name] or -hero [hero name] or -hero [hero name] all

desc: Filter through items and skills using pre-defined keywords
